Rapier Mastery III
Jump between [1] target(s) within [2], dealing [3].
On hit, there is a [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_Rapier_FrenzyChargeChancePerHit]% chance to gain a [Key:LLWEAPONEX_RAPIER_FRENZYCHARGE_DisplayName:Frenzy Charge].
Frenzy Charges are automatically consumed to continue jumping ([ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_Rapier_FlickerStrikeMaxJumps] jumps max), dealing [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_Rapier_FlickerStrikeBonusDamageReduction]% less damage.

Rapier Mastery I
Take a stance that enhances guile and speed.
While your offhand is empty, gain [1]% Damage, [2], [3], and [4]% additional Movement Speed.
Critical/Backstab attacks grant +[5] AP once every 2 turns.
Weapon attacks and skill will do an additional [6].

Rapier Mastery II
A follow up blow to Sucker Punch that deals [1].
If the target is Knocked Down, Dizzy is applied for 2 turns when they stand up.
Single-use skill.

Rapier Mastery II
A follow up blow to Dizzying Smash that deals [1] and pushes the target back 3m.
If the target is Knocked Down, enemies they collide with have a chance to be knocked down, and both they and the target take [2] per collision.
On hit, refreshes the cooldown for Sucker Punch.
Single-use skill.
